com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.api

Class DetailAST

  • java.lang.Object
    • antlr.BaseAST
      • antlr.CommonAST
        • antlr.CommonASTWithHiddenTokens
          • com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.api.DetailAST
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    antlr.collections.AST, Serializable

    public final class DetailAST
extends antlr.CommonASTWithHiddenTokens
    An extension of the CommonAST that records the line and column number.
    Author:
    Oliver Burn, lkuehne
    See Also:
    ANTLR Website, Serialized Form

      • getChildCount

        public int getChildCount()
        Returns the number of child nodes one level below this node. That is is does not recurse down the tree.
        Returns:
        the number of child nodes
